title: 관계부사 where/when/why 심화
examples: This is the place where we first met when we were students.
I remember the day when everything changed, which was why we had to adapt.
The reason why the project succeeded was the moment when everyone collaborated effectively.
learning_points: 관계부사의 중첩과 연결을 통한 복잡한 관계 표현

sentences.kr: 이곳이 우리가 학생이었을 때 처음 만난 장소다.
sentences.en: This is the place where we first met when we were students.

sentences.kr: 모든 것이 바뀐 그 날을 기억하는데, 그래서 우리가 적응해야 했다.
sentences.en: I remember the day when everything changed, which was why we had to adapt.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트가 성공한 이유는 모든 사람이 효과적으로 협력한 그 순간 때문이었다.
sentences.en: The reason why the project succeeded was the moment when everyone collaborated effectively.

sentences.kr: 그들이 만난 카페는 결정적인 논의가 이루어진 곳이었다.
sentences.en: The cafe where they met was the place where crucial discussions took place.

sentences.kr: 새로운 정책이 발표된 시기가 시장이 불안정했던 때였다.
sentences.en: The time when the new policy was announced was when the market was unstable.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 떠난 이유를 우리가 이해하지 못한 것은 아니었다.
sentences.en: The reason why she left wasn't something we couldn't understand.

sentences.kr: 회의가 열린 건물이 새로운 아이디어가 탄생한 장소가 되었다.
sentences.en: The building where the meeting was held became the place where new ideas were born.

sentences.kr: 위기가 발생한 순간이 팀이 진정으로 단결된 때였다.
sentences.en: The moment when the crisis occurred was when the team truly united.
